channel.title: Posts on Kamille Piacquadio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kamille Piacquadio

item.title: KP Longhorn Diaries
item.description: #The Longhorn Diaries Entry 1 ##“A place where I feel safe about discussing my consumption of alcohol both to celebrate my successes and cope with the challenges of being a growing scientist. It’s a hard knock life for us.” Link to project 1 Link to google a <- "Absolut" b <- "Baileys" c <- "Chambord" a ## [1] "Absolut" b ## [1] "Baileys" c ## [1] "Chambord" print("You are doing great, and vodka sodas make it all better!

item.title: KP Longhorn Diaries 2
item.description: #The Longhorn Diaries Entry 2 list1=[24,48,72,96] list2=["day1","day2","day3","day4"] list1[3] ## 96 list2[1:3] ## ['day2', 'day3'] list1[::2] ## [24, 72] list1[3]=1000 list1 ## [24, 48, 72, 1000] list3=["monkey","giraffe","shark","caterpillar","squid","jellyfish"] list3[0] ## 'monkey' list3[2:4] ## ['shark', 'caterpillar'] list3[5] ## 'jellyfish' list3[1]="cat" list3.append("spider") print("dog" in list3) ## False print("monkey" in list3) ## True library(reticulate) pasta <- c("spaghetti", "fettuccine", "linguine") color <- "red" sauce="tomato","alfredo","pesto" drink="wine" print(r.pasta,sauce) ## ['spaghetti', 'fettuccine', 'linguine'] ('tomato', 'alfredo', 'pesto') cat(c(color,py$drink)) ## red wine
